00012 @require_once('config.inc.php');
00013 require_once('common.inc.php');
00014 require_once('controller.inc.php');
00015 require_once('html.inc.php');

00020 /**
00021  *      controller that shows a textarea for editing either a page's or the global 
00022  *      user-defined css file
00023  */
00024 function controller_user_css_stylesheet($args)
00025 {
00026         if ($args[0][1] == 'stylesheet') {
00027                 // changing page stylesheet
00028                 $page = $args[0][0];
00029                 page_canonical($page);
00030                 if (!page_exists($page)) {
00031                         hotglue_error(404);
00032                 }
00033         } else {
00034                 // changing global stylesheet
00035                 $page = false;
00036         }
00037         
00038         default_html(true);
00039         html_add_js_var('$.glue.page', $page);
00040         html_add_css(base_url().'modules/user_css/user_css.css');
00041         if (USE_MIN_FILES) {
00042                 html_add_js(base_url().'modules/user_css/user_css.min.js');
00043         } else {
00044                 html_add_js(base_url().'modules/user_css/user_css.js');
00045         }
00046         $bdy = &body();
00047         elem_attr($bdy, 'id', 'user_css');
00048         if ($page === false) {
00049                 body_append('<h1>Global stylesheet</h1>'.nl());
00050                 // try to load css
00051                 $css = @file_get_contents(CONTENT_DIR.'/usercss');
00052                 if ($css === false) {
00053                         $css = '';
00054                 }
00055         } else {
00056                 body_append('<h1>'.htmlspecialchars($page, ENT_NOQUOTES, 'UTF-8').' stylesheet</h1>'.nl());
00057                 load_modules('glue');
00058                 $obj = load_object(array('name'=>$page.'.usercss'));
00059                 if ($obj['#error']) {
00060                         $css = '';
00061                 } else {
00062                         $css = $obj['#data']['content'];
00063                 }
00064         }
00065         // encoding to html must come before the replacement below
00066         $css = htmlspecialchars($css, ENT_NOQUOTES, 'UTF-8');
00067         // replace newline characters by an entity to prevent render_object() 
00068         // from adding some indentation
00069         $css = str_replace("\r\n", '&#10;', $css);
00070         $css = str_replace("\n", '&#10;', $css);
00071         // why not replace tabs as well why we are at it
00072         $css = str_replace("\t", '&#09;', $css);
00073         body_append('<textarea id="user_css_text" placeholder="enter css code here">'.$css.'</textarea>'.nl());
00074         body_append('<br>'.nl());
00075         body_append('<input id="user_css_save" type="button" value="save">'.nl());
00076         echo html_finalize();
00077 }
00078 
00079 register_controller('stylesheet', '', 'controller_user_css_stylesheet', array('auth'=>true));
00080 register_controller('*', 'stylesheet', 'controller_user_css_stylesheet', array('auth'=>true));
00081 
00082 
00083 function user_css_render_object($args)
00084 {
00085         $obj = $args['obj'];
00086         if (!isset($obj['type']) || $obj['type'] != 'usercss') {
00087                 return false;
00088         }
00089         
00090         if (!empty($obj['content'])) {
00091                 html_add_css_inline($obj['content'], 6);
00092         }
00093         return '';
00094 }
00095 
00096 
00097 function user_css_render_page_early($args)
00098 {
00099         // include the global usercss if it exists
00100         if (@is_file(CONTENT_DIR.'/usercss')) {
00101                 html_add_css_inline(@file_get_contents(CONTENT_DIR.'/usercss'), 5);
00102         }
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 /**
00107  *      set the user-defined css file
00108  *
00109  *      @param array $args arguments
00110  *              key 'page' is the page (i.e. page.rev) or false the global css
00111  *              key 'css' is the content of the css file
00112  *      @return array response
00113  *              true if successful
00114  */
00115 function user_css_set_css($args)
00116 {
00117         if (!isset($args['page']) || ($args['page'] !== false && !page_exists($args['page']))) {
00118                 return response('Required argument "page" missing or invalid', 400);
00119         }
00120         if (!isset($args['css'])) {
00121                 return response('Required argument "css" missing', 400);
00122         }
00123         
00124         if ($args['page'] === false) {
00125                 drop_cache('page');
00126                 if (empty($args['css'])) {
00127                         // empty stylesheet
00128                         @unlink(CONTENT_DIR.'/usercss');
00129                         return response(true);
00130                 } else {
00131                         $m = umask(0111);
00132                         if (!@file_put_contents(CONTENT_DIR.'/usercss', $args['css'])) {
00133                                 umask($m);
00134                                 return response('Error saving stylesheet', 500);
00135                         } else {
00136                                 umask($m);
00137                                 return response(true);
00138                         }
00139                 }
00140         } else {
00141                 drop_cache('page', $args['page']);
00142                 load_modules('glue');
00143                 if (empty($args['css'])) {
00144                         delete_object(array('name'=>$args['page'].'.usercss'));
00145                         return response(true);
00146                 } else {
00147                         return update_object(array('name'=>$args['page'].'.usercss', 'type'=>'usercss', 'module'=>'user_css', 'content'=>$args['css']));
00148                 }
00149         }
00150 }
00151 
00152 register_service('user_css.set_css', 'user_css_set_css', array('auth'=>true));
